overview: Alongside the Burns family, Autobots Chase, Heatwave, Blades and Boulder (known to the citizens of Griffin Rock as the Rescue Bots) battle all manners of hazards each and every day. From powerful winter storms to ocean rescues, nothing is too great a challenge for our heroes. Except, maybe, ghost ships! Oh, well... All in a dayâ€™s duty for the Rescue Bots!
title: Transformers Rescue Bots: Outdoor Adventures
